channel.title: CVE Feed for bigbluebutton -- greenlight
channel.description: The latest CVEs for bigbluebutton -- greenlight

item.title: CVE-2022-36029|2024-08-29T20:11:18.365Z -- bigbluebutton -- greenlight
item.description: Greenlight is an end-user interface for BigBlueButton servers. Versions prior to 2.13.0 have an open redirect vulnerability in the Login page due to unchecked the value of the `return_to` cookie. Versions 2.13.0 contains a patch for the issue.
